Package com.ntu.scse

Class Reservation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ntu.scse.Reservation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Reservation>

    public class Reservation
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Reservation>
    Represents a hotel Reservation that contains reservation details as well as relevant room and guest details. One ReservationManager can contain many Reservations.
    Since:
    19/04/2018
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Cai LingZhi, Liu Fangbing, Christopher Lim, Eliza Wong
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Creates a new Reservation with the given ID, reservation details, room details, guest details.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Reservation

        public Reservation​(int resvNo,
                   java.lang.String roomNo,
                   java.lang.String roomType,
                   int guestID,
                   int adultNo,
                   int kidNo,
                   java.time.LocalDate dateCheckIn,
                   java.time.LocalDate dateCheckOut,
                   java.lang.String resvStatus,
                   java.time.LocalTime resvTime)
        Creates a new Reservation with the given ID, reservation details, room details, guest details. Automatically calculates the number of nights stay using the check in and out dates.
        Parameters:
        resvNo - The unique Reservation number.
        roomNo - The room number associated with this reservation.
        roomType - The room type associated with this reservation.
        guestID - The guest ID associated with this reservation.
        adultNo - The number of adults in this reservation.
        kidNo - TThe number of kids in this reservation.
        dateCheckIn - The check in date of this reservation.
        dateCheckOut - The check out date of this reservation.
        resvStatus - The status of this reservation.
        resvTime - The time that this reservation was placed.
